title: 方块重力mod装进去玩不了
author: Jackson1122008
txt_content:
刚开始装进去了可以进，可是在加载地图时就出现了以下文字：
我放进mods里了，不知道对不对啊？{:10_527:}各位大大求解！

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop

A full error report has been saved to D:\整合包\惜缘丶小希1.5.2简单整合【第二版】\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-27_23.17.38-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT bd530aa0 --------
Full report at:
D:\整合包\惜缘丶小希1.5.2简单整合【第二版】\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-27_23.17.38-server.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-6-27 下午11:17

-- System Details --
Details:回帖有奖啊~

replies.txt_content: 装错了，你要装在Coremods文件夹内

replies.author: rom718
replies.txt_content:
装上后小心显卡...

我之前就是显卡太渣显卡崩了几次...
